TopicTitle: Old versions of KSP (some versions still wanted!)

Articles.Content: Is it possible that squad could let all versions prior to 0.18 go? I mean they are so old and different from the current release that they are no longer anything more than demos and nostalgia. Please do it Squad this thread is meant to be for the preservation of old versions and if we can't preserve the old paid versions then they will fade away into memories and nothing more as neither the ksp website nor steam will let us purchase them as an archive.
the links are broken

Yes indeed, time to look at closing this old thread down. 

See a more official version here, with the final point versions in each release.
